short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eazy Form Filler is a Chrome extension designed to simplify testing and form filling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It identifies forms on a webpage, allows users to save input values, and can prefill these saved values upon subsequent visits. Ideal for developers and testers who frequently work with forms.
